mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE CONCAT(EMP_LAST_NAME, EMP_FIRST_NAME) LIKE '%' || #{inputData} || '%' AND EMP_CODE != #{empCode}
SELECT EMP_LAST_NAME || EMP_FIRST_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_CODE = #{invitedEmpNo}
SELECT CR.*, SA.SUB_ADDR FROM CHAT_PARTICIPANT CP LEFT JOIN CHAT_ROOM CR ON (CP.ROOM_NO = CR.ROOM_NO) LEFT JOIN SUBSCRIBE_ADDR SA ON (CP.ROOM_NO = SA.ROOM_NO) WHERE CP.EMP_CODE = #{empCode}
SELECT CONTENT, SENT_AT FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY

SELECT E.EMP_LAST_NAME, E.EMP_FIRST_NAME, E.PROFILE_IMG FROM CHAT_PARTICIPANT CP LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON CP.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE WHERE CP.PARTICIPANT_NO = ( SELECT MIN(CP2.PARTICIPANT_NO) FROM CHAT_PARTICIPANT CP2 WHERE CP2.ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} )
SELECT CM.*, E.EMP_LAST_NAME, E.EMP_FIRST_NAME, E.PROFILE_IMG FROM CHAT_MESSAGE CM LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (CM.SENDER_EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE) WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE VALUES (SEQ_CHAT_MESSAGE.NEXTVAL,#{roomNo}, #{senderEmpCode}, #{messageType}, #{content}, NULL, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE VALUES (SEQ_CHAT_MESSAGE.NEXTVAL, #{roomNo}, #{senderEmpCode}, 2, NULL, #{filePath}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT T.TEAM_NM, D.DEPT_NM FROM TEAM T LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (T.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) WHERE TEAM_NO = #{teamNo}
